Package Src.Manager

Class TitleManager

java.lang.Object
Src.Manager.TitleManager
public class TitleManager extends Object
Class TitleManager manages the game map and titles.

  • Constructor Details

    • TitleManager

      public TitleManager(GamePanel gp, String filePath)
      Constructor class TitleManager that initializes the GamePanel reference, loads title images, and sets up the initial map
      Parameters:
      gp - The GamePanel instance associated with the TitleManager
      filePath - path for Titlemanager to generate map

  • Method Details

    • getTitleImage

      public void getTitleImage()
      Loads images for different map titles and initializes the 'titles' list.

    • LoadMap

      public void LoadMap(String filePath)
      Loads a game map from a specified file path and populates the 'mapTitleNum'array
      Parameters:
      filePath - The file path of the map data to be loaded.

    • Draw

      public void Draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Method to draws the game map and its titles on the provided Graphics2D object
      Parameters:
      g2 - The Graphics2D object on which the game map and titles will be drawn

    • ReturnPlayerPos

      public Vector2 ReturnPlayerPos()
      Method to returns the position (Vector2) of the player on the game map.
      Returns:
      The Vector2 representing the player's position. If not found, returns a default Vector2.

    • GetTitleFromRec

      public Title GetTitleFromRec(Rectangle rec)
      Method that retrieves a Title object based on an intersection with a specified rectangle.
      Parameters:
      rec - the rectangle to check for intersection.
      Returns:
      a Title object representing the title on the map that intersects with the rectangle.

    • GetTitleFromPos

      public Title GetTitleFromPos(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size)
      Method that retrieves a Title object based on a specified position.
      Parameters:
      pos - the position for which to retrieve the corresponding Title object
      size - the size of title object
      Returns:
      a Title object representing the title on the map at the specified position, or null if not found.

    • returnTitlePos

      public ArrayList<Vector2> returnTitlePos(TitleManager.TitleType titleType)
      Method to returns the positions of specific titles in a map.
      Parameters:
      titleType - The type of title to find in the map.
      Returns:
      ArrayList A list of positions for the specified title type.

    • getRangedTitleIndex

      public ArrayList<Vector2> getRangedTitleIndex(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size)
      Method to returns the indices of titles within a one-tile range of a specified position, excluding obstacles
      Parameters:
      pos - The position from which to find nearby titles
      size - the size of the area to search
      Returns:
      ArrayList A list of indices for the titles within range

    • returnPosFromIndex

      public Vector2 returnPosFromIndex(Vector2 index)
      Method to returns the position of a title given its index in the map.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the title in the map.
      Returns:
      Vector2 The position of the title. If the title is not found, it returns null.

    • isEntityInsidePerimeter

      public boolean isEntityInsidePerimeter(Collider coll)
      Method to checks if an entity, represented by a collider, is inside a specified perimeter.
      Parameters:
      coll - The collider representing the entity.
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if the entity is inside the perimeter, false otherwise.

    • getRangedTitlePos

      public ArrayList<Vector2> getRangedTitlePos(Vector2 pos, Vector2 size)
      Method to returns the positions of titles within a one-tile range of a specified position, excluding obstacles
      Parameters:
      pos - The position from which to find nearby titles
      size - The size of the area to search
      Returns:
      ArrayList A list of positions for the titles within range
